title: Improve RTimerTree documentation
description: The comment of public RTimerTree sub(String desc) is a bit misleading, stating that the method creates new subtimer with given name and status START, this is partially true because if the timer was previously requested and stopped, the old timer will be returned with status STOP. I changed the comment in order to clarify the behaviour.
